page.title: 11Recreation B'ham
page.content:
We carried out a questionnaire survey into the recreational pursuits of famillies in our area. We discovered that: watching T.V., listening to the radio and reading newspapers/books was carried on in most homes; gardening was popular; visiting the local park, library and swimming pool was very popular; pop music was the favourite form of music listened to; few people rode a bicycle; some people liked to visit the amusement arcade on the Stratford Road; half the people questionned went for a holiday away from Birmingham; half the people interviewed had visited local museums/art galleries.
Recreation took place mainly in the Home.
